title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about Tom Brady’s return to New England for the first time as a Buccaneer and defends Bill Belichick for all the criticism he’s received since Brady’s departure in free agency. He supports Giants head coach Joe Judge and the comments he had about analytics in the NFL. He also praises Dak Prescott for how he’s preformed so far this season and which QBs he would take over Prescott for the next 5 years. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to analyze Justin Herbert in his second season and how he compares to other top play callers across the league.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
